post.title: Mutenga Bamboo participates in Circular Valley
post.content:
The turning point.
The turning point in the journey to implement the Rowen Meda authored Mutenga Renewable and Sustainable Bamboo Circular Economy Concept #MRSBCEConcept was in the successfull participation of Mutenga team in the Circular Valley Accelerator program in Wuppertal Germany https://circular-valley.org/. This event was an opening to the Mutenga team as they got the chance to rub shoulders in networking, trained and nurtured by the best in circular economy. Circular Valley in Europe is what Silicon Valley is to America and as such Mutenga team comprising of the CEO and Founder Rowen Meda and co-founder Farai Musendo is exuberating with confidence in building a multi million dollar company that protects the environment whilst growing the economy. It took the excellent discovery of the Circular Valley team led by Dr Carsten Gerhardt to take in Mutenga Bamboo "the Hidden WiN in ZiM" into their wings. 

At Circular  Valley  Mutenga had the ability to network with other like minded and sharp brains in Circular economy. 

![](http://127.0.0.1:8000/storage/M8jI6ORgHMxO851HvK5kCundhlWLcjIX0v7zUjtz.jpg)
![](http://127.0.0.1:8000/storage/C46zexVQLOqwixdpxgBGsOHcgXEOiGCGr2NO1jge.jpg)
![](http://127.0.0.1:8000/storage/eE6Mp1rr7Ik0fPILkwgjDGLIxoGEkY7qsM1irJQi.jpg)


The hospitality of the people of Wuppertal made the team feel at home in a freezing winter season. Despite being one of the hardest times in human history because  of Covid the Mutenga team enjoyed their stay each and everyday as they visited great sites in Wuppertal. 

![](http://127.0.0.1:8000/storage/56Uhj2vBa4EAt6YOynQxPFdcROWQLM3VQGY5tUsO.jpg)


1. [Mutenga Bamboo at the Circular Valley Demo Day](youtube.com/watch?v=HWiEsleK1_8) 
2. [Circular Valley Demo Day#2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AYAy8hdDnM) 

The [demoday presentation](https://youtu.be/HWiEsleK1_8) on March 11 2023 by Rowen Meda opened many doors to future export opportunities and partnerships in Europe.
